about_the_game:
"It's October 31, follow Jake as he gets ready for a killer Halloween party."

Jake's Halloween Night is a short horror game inspired by old slasher movies, that at the same time, makes a bit of fun of said genre.
The project originally started, developed, and finished in October 2021 as a personal challenge, but now comes back remastered with new art, improved graphics, and lots of new secrets.

Features



  • Pixel art visuals.
  • Drawn cutscenes and objects.
  • Story-driven with environmental storytelling.
  • Three endings.
  • A couple of classic (and cliche) horror references.

Gameplay


The game has a duration of 15 to 25 minutes of gameplay, with simple puzzles. If you enjoy clicking everything to find bits of information in your surroundings, and piecing together the untold events going on, this game is for you.

Controls:
Full screen: F4
Move: WASD / Arrow keys
Interact: Enter
Menu: E
Cancel: Esc / X
